posts.post_title: SOLD: Raw Poor P150 Green Cobb Portrait - Beautiful front, scrapbook damaged back
posts.post_content:
SOLD
Originally an SGC 1 before I cracked it out.
Please PM or email [url]trae@t206.org[/url]

Pictures:

Also open to trade + cash for sharp SL'ers that I need (A / trim is fine) [URL="https://t206.org/misc/8-16-21-cobb-green/SLers-4-2-21.png"]examples of what I consider "sharp"[/URL]:
